# Project : WinSpeak

## Overview
WinSpeak is a modern, powerful, and easy-to-use C++ library for controlling speakers in Windows. 
It allows you to manage volume, mute/unmute speakers, and query audio status simply, quickly, and securely.

## Language and Platform and Compiler and Standard language C++ and Build system
- Language: C++
- Platform: Windows only
- Compiler: mingw
- Standard: C++20
- Build system: CMake

## Project History
- Initial development started: 27/04/2025
- Current status: active development
- Original author: Tina-1300

## Code Organization
- include/WinSpeak/ : public headers
- src/ : implementation files
- docs/ : additional documentation and examples
- tests/ : unit tests

## Core features:
- Gets the current speaker volume.
- Allows you to change the speaker volume.
- Allows you to check whether the speakers are muted or unmuted.
- Allows you to change the speaker state, putting them in mute or unmute mode.
